allowDrop.description: Whether to allow drag and drop in the dropzone element

files.description: The current value of the file input

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  dropzone: string
  hiddenInput: string
  trigger: string
  label: string
  item(id: string): string
  itemName(id: string): string
  itemSizeText(id: string): string
  itemPreview(id: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements. Useful for composition.

locale.description: The current locale. Based on the BCP 47 definition.

maxFileSize.description: The maximum file size in bytes

minFileSize.description: The minimum file size in bytes

name.description: The name of the underlying file input

onFileAccept.description: Function called when the file is accepted

onFileReject.description: Function called when the file is rejected

onFilesChange.description: Function called when the value changes, whether accepted or rejected

align.description:
How to align the image within its bounds.
It maps to css `object-position` property.

crossOrigin.description:
The key used to set the crossOrigin on the HTMLImageElement into which the image will be loaded.
This tells the browser to request cross-origin access when trying to download the image data.

fallback.description: Fallback element to show if image is loading or image fails.

fallbackSrc.description:
Fallback image `src` to show if image is loading or image fails.

Note ðŸš¨: We recommend you use a local image

fallbackStrategy.description:
- beforeLoadOrError(default): loads the fallbackImage while loading the src
- onError: loads the fallbackImage only if there is an error fetching the src

fit.description:
How the image to fit within its bounds.
It maps to css `object-fit` property.

htmlHeight.description: The native HTML `height` attribute to the passed to the `img`

htmlWidth.description: The native HTML `width` attribute to the passed to the `img`

ignoreFallback.description: If `true`, opt out of the `fallbackSrc` logic and use as `img`

onError.description: A callback for when there was an error loading the image `src`

onLoad.description: A callback for when the image `src` has been loaded

allowDrop.description: Whether to allow drag and drop in the dropzone element

children.type:
type ONLY_FOR_FORMAT =
  | string
  | number
  | boolean
  | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>
  | Iterable<ReactNode>
  | ReactPortal
  | PromiseLikeOfReactNode
  | ((props: FileUploadRenderContext) => ReactNode)
